name.baseName: Castor refined oil ; Castor seed ; Pressing + refining ; greater than or equal to200 t - raw material/d; NESPS2
蓖麻精制油 ; 蓖麻籽 ; 压榨+精炼 ; 大于等于200吨-原料/天 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 蓖麻精制油的工艺包括蓖麻籽的压榨和精炼，适用于大规模工业生产，处理能力大于等于每天200吨原料。该工艺主要用于生产润滑剂、塑料、药品以及作为高性能燃料的添加剂。该工艺所包含的管末管理技术主要针对废水、化学需氧量、总磷和与石油相关的废物处理，以减少环境污染。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码13,四级代码1332文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
nan
源文件中描述为为蓖麻籽，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94.78
污染物指标石油类a的末端治理技术是物理处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为94.78，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类a，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为石油类a
